scripts.prettier: forge fmt && forge fmt ./test/** && forge fmt ./scripts/**
scripts.test:holesky:multi-vault:acceptance: forge test -vvv --fork-url $(grep HOLESKY_RPC .env | cut -d '=' -f2,3,4,5) --evm-version shanghai --fork-block-number 3390406 --match-test testDeployScriptTestDeployment
scripts.test:mainnet:multi-vault:acceptance:batc: forge test -vvv --fork-url $(grep MAINNET_RPC .env | cut -d '=' -f2,3,4,5) --evm-version cancun --fork-block-number 21887183 --match-test testDeployScriptMainnetDeploymentBatch1
forge test -vvv --fork-url $(grep MAINNET_RPC .env | cut -d '=' -f2,3,4,5) --evm-version cancun --fork-block-number 21966465 --match-test testDeployScriptMainnetDeploymentBatch2
scripts.test:migrations: forge test -vvv --fork-url $(grep MAINNET_RPC .env | cut -d '=' -f2,3,4,5) --fork-block-number 21731211  --match-path test/unit/MigratorTest.t.sol --evm-version cancun
scripts.test:eigen: forge test --evm-version cancun -vv --fork-url $(grep HOLESKY_RPC .env | cut -d '=' -f2,3,4,5) --fork-block-number 3565848 --match-path igen
scripts.scc:report: scc src --sort names --no-cocomo --exclude-dir interfaces --by-file --format wide > scc-report.txt
scripts.coverage:report: forge coverage --force --fork-url $(grep HOLESKY_RPC .env | cut -d '=' -f2,3,4,5) --gas-limit 1000000000000000 --fork-block-number 2686616 --report lcov && genhtml lcov.info -o report --branch-coverage --rc derive_function_end_line=0 && rm lcov.info
scripts.deploy:holesky:factory: forge script --use 0.8.25 scripts/holesky/HoleskyDeploy.s.sol:Deploy --rpc-url $(grep HOLESKY_RPC .env | cut -d '=' -f2,3,4,5) --broadcast --legacy -vvvv --verify --etherscan-api-key $(grep HOLESKY_API_KEY .env | cut -d '=' -f2)
scripts.deploy:holesky:multi-vault: forge script --use 0.8.25 scripts/holesky/MultiVaultDeployScript.s.sol:Deploy --rpc-url $(grep HOLESKY_RPC .env | cut -d '=' -f2,3,4,5) --broadcast --legacy -vvvv --verify --etherscan-api-key $(grep HOLESKY_API_KEY .env | cut -d '=' -f2)
scripts.deploy:holesky:prelaunch: forge script --use 0.8.25 scripts/holesky/PrelaunchDeployScript.s.sol:Deploy --rpc-url $(grep HOLESKY_RPC .env | cut -d '=' -f2,3,4,5) --broadcast --legacy -vvvv --verify --etherscan-api-key $(grep HOLESKY_API_KEY .env | cut -d '=' -f2)
scripts.deploy:mainnet:multi-vault:migrator: forge script --use 0.8.25 scripts/mainnet/MainnetMigratorDeploy.s.sol:Deploy --rpc-url $(grep MAINNET_RPC .env | cut -d '=' -f2,3,4,5) --broadcast --slow --evm-version cancun -vvvv --verify --etherscan-api-key $(grep ETHERSCAN_API_KEY .env | cut -d '=' -f2)
